content: Eye coupler Eye coupler for joining the hanger rod to structural steel ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > Standard fixings for support systems- - - ### FEATURES:Features For joining to steel, concrete and wood Available in various sizes Applications For joining hanger rod to a structure A structural attachment used to join hanger rod to a structure Offset eye coupler provides unlimited vertical rod adjustment ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material type: Steel, Concrete, Wood Rod size - RS: 3/8 in Material composition: Carbon steel Technical Data | Base material type | Steel, Concrete, Wood | Material composition | Carbon steel | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Pre-galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) | Load range | Light duty ### ITEMS- 258317 - Eye coupler EC 3/8 - Package Size 250 pc - 258318 - Eye coupler offset EC 3/8 - Package Size 250 pc
